about.name: About
about.heading: About Me
about.description: Hi! I'm Vitor Bressan, a self-taught developer focused on Backend Web Development using Python. I enjoy building the logic behind applications, connecting systems, and creating reliable backend solutions. I've been consistently studying programming, working on personal projects, and I also have professional experience as an intern solving real problems in a production environment. My goal is to land a backend developer position, grow my skills, and contribute to meaningful projects.
